<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770209995</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Simple Circuit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einfacher Stromkreis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Circuit Simple</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Circuito Simples</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Circuito Semplice</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απλό κύκλωμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Circuito Simple</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is an activity for circuit testing. This object is also designed for presentation via Windows-based hand-held devices.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist eine Aktivität für die Satzprüfung. 
Diese Nachricht ist auch für Darstellung über Windows-basierte
Handeinheiten bestimmt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est une activité pour le test de circuit. 
Cet objet est également conçu pour la présentation par 
l'intermédiaire des dispositifs tenus dans la main windows-based.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma atividade para testar de circuito. 
Este objeto é projetado também para a apresentação através 
dos dispositivos hand-held windows-based.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un'attività per la prova di circuito. 
Questo oggetto egualmente è progettato per la presentazione via
i dispositivi tenuti in mano windows-based.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι μια δραστηριότητα για τη δοκιμή 
κυκλωμάτων. Αυτό το αντικείμενο σχεδιάζεται επίσης για την 
παρουσίαση μέσω των βασισμένων στα WINDOWS φορητών συσκευών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es una actividad para la prueba de circuito. 
Este objeto también se diseña para la presentación vía los 
dispositivos hand-held windows-based.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>

        </lifeCycle>

    </metadata>
  </description>
